verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> reigns! <S%H4427><s%> Let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> tremble. <S%H7264><s%> He sits <S%H3427><s%> enthroned among the cherubim. <S%H3742><s%> Let the earth <S%H776><s%> be moved. <S%H5120><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in Zion. <S%H6726><s%> He is high <S%H7311><s%> above all the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
Let them praise <S%H3034><s%> your great <S%H1419><s%> and awesome <S%H3372><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%> He is Holy! <S%H6918><s%>

The King <S%H4428><s%>'s strength <S%H5797><s%> also loves <S%H157><s%> justice. <S%H4941><s%> You do establish <S%H3559><s%> equity. <S%H4339><s%> You execute <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Exalt <S%H7311><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%> Worship <S%H7812><s%> at his footstool. <S%H7272><s%> He is Holy! <S%H6918><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> were among his priests, <S%H3548><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> among those who call <S%H7121><s%> on his name; <S%H8034><s%> they called <S%H7121><s%> on Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and he answered them. <S%H6030><s%>
He spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them in the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud. <S%H6051><s%> They kept <S%H8104><s%> his testimonies, <S%H5713><s%> the statute <S%H2706><s%> that he gave them. <S%H5414><s%>

You answered <S%H6030><s%> them, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh our God. <S%H430><s%> You are a God <S%H410><s%> who forgave <S%H5375><s%> them, <S%H5358><s%> although you took vengeance for their doings. <S%H5949><s%>

Exalt <S%H7311><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%> Worship <S%H7812><s%> at his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill, <S%H2022><s%> for Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> is holy! <S%H6918><s%>
